function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highrise apartment buildings increase contact with shared surfaces and hinder access to fresh air and nature.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and negative physiological effects on residents.","Mitigation":"Implement touchless technologies, increase access to fresh air and nature, and prioritize low-rise and mid-rise dwellings.","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, green roofs, and balcony design.","People":"Residents of highrise apartment buildings.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and housing developers."},{"Description":"Migration away from crowded cities leads to changes in the form and type of housing, potentially impacting disease spread in new areas.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to new locations due to changes in urbanization.","Mitigation":"Implement effective zoning and infrastructure planning to accommodate new housing developments outside of crowded cities.","Technologies":"Zoning regulations, urban planning software, and infrastructure development.","People":"New residents in remote suburbs, small villages, and deserts.","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and developers."}]}
